PACK.update.new.de-DE: <color:#96a7b2>Eine neue [green]Version</color> für unser [blue]Texturepack</color> ist jetzt verfügbar. Du kannst [blue]<click:run_command:'/loadpack'>hier</click></color> klicken, um es dir zu installieren oder einfach den Command [blue]<click:run_command:'/loadpack'>/loadpack</click></color> ausführen.</color>
PACK.update.new.en-US: <color:#96a7b2>A new [green]version</color> for our [blue]texture pack</color> is now available. You can click [blue]<click:run_command:'/loadpack'>here</click></color> to install it or simply run the command [blue]<click:run_command:'/loadpack'>/loadpack</click>.</color></color>

PACK.command.apply.en-US: <color:#96a7b2>The [blue]texture pack</color> has been [green]successfully</color> downloaded and installed!</color>

PACK.command.apply.failed.de-DE: <color:#96a7b2>Das [blue]Texturepack</color> konnte <color:#ff0000>nicht</color> erfolgreich heruntergeladen und installiert werden!</color>
PACK.command.apply.failed.en-US: <color:#96a7b2>The [blue]texture pack</color> could <color:#ff0000>not</color> be downloaded and installed successfully!</color>
